QuestionText: Who did the Syrian president accuse of exploiting Oct. 7 according to a recent headline?
Which organization does Israel claim knows the location of slain hostage Ran Gvili?
According to a recent headline, who warned that blocking Trump’s Gaza plan would be a ‘huge failure’ for the US and the world?
Where is the fast-growing church that young adults are lining up to worship at, according to a recent headline?
Who was recently arrested by the Lebanese army after an attack on UN peacekeepers in the south?
